Purpose: To outline acceptable professional behaviour and integrity.
Key Rules & Expectations: Follow ethics, respect colleagues, avoid conflicts of interest, maintain professionalism.
Responsibilities: Employees must adhere; HR monitors and guides.
Compliance/Monitoring: Reviewed via audits, HR oversight and incident reports.
Consequences for Violations: Warnings, disciplinary actions, termination in severe cases.

Purpose: To safeguard company systems, data, and networks.
Key Rules & Expectations: No sharing passwords, lock devices, report suspicious activity.
Responsibilities: IT monitors infrastructure; employees follow guidelines.
Compliance/Monitoring: Security tools, access logs, regular reviews.

Purpose: To ensure secure authentication for systems.
Key Rules & Expectations: Min 12 characters, MFA required, rotation every 60-90 days.
Responsibilities: Employees manage passwords; IT enforces policy.

Purpose: To ensure responsible use and protection of company hardware.
Key Rules & Expectations: Do not install unauthorized software, ensure safe storage, return assets when required.
Responsibilities: Users maintain assets; IT controls issuance and audits.
Consequences for Violations: Recovery cost deduction, legal action if abuse.

Purpose: To ensure secure and professional use of corporate email.
Key Rules & Expectations: Use for business only, no spam, phishing reporting mandatory.
Consequences for Violations: Account disabling, HR actions in misuse cases.

Purpose: Defines leave entitlement and attendance expectations.
Scope: All permanent employees; applicable as relevant for contract staff.
Key Rules & Expectations: Apply leave in advance, maintain attendance, observe organization norms.

Purpose: To regulate productivity and data security during remote working.
Key Rules & Expectations: Maintain availability, secure VPN usage, follow communication criteria.
Responsibilities: Employees follow; Managers review productivity; IT ensures security.

Purpose: To protect personal and confidential information.
Key Rules & Expectations: No unauthorized access/shared data; encryption; confidentiality.

Purpose: To regulate network usage and avoid misuse.
Key Rules & Expectations: No illegal sites, limited personal browsing allowed, no downloads violating policy.
Responsibilities: Employees comply; security team monitors traffic.
